description.value:
Starting at 2nd level, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weaponâ€™s damage.

The extra damage is [[/r 2d8]] for a 1st-level spell slot, plus [[/r 1d8]] for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of [[/r 5d8]]. The damage increases by [[/r 1d8]] if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of [[/r 6d8]].

DM Note: Enable Character Sheet Hook in Item Macro's module settings. Alternatively, add the @UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-macros.XSuQe3bQ2Kx6yDq5]{Divine Smite} macro to your hot bar.
